Grant status indicator

Grant status indicator

Display the current status of a grant.

On this page
  • Visual design
  • Guidelines for use
  • Layouts

Visual design

Open grant

Open
Open date:

1st January 2019

 
Close date:

1st January 2022.

 
Application detail:

You can apply at any time.

 

CSS styles

Grant status

p.status {
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 18px;
    color: #333333;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 32px;
}

Grant details

p.details {
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #333333;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
p.details strong {
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
}

Open icon

.icon-open {
    height: 24px;
    width: 24px;
    color: #219520;
}
.icon-container {
    background: #E8F4E8;
    height: 64px;
    width: 64px;
    border-radius: 50%;
}

Closed grant

Closed
Application detail:

Applications closed June 2019 and will reopen in January 2022.

Grant status

    line-height: 32px;

.icon-closed {
    height: 24px;
    width: 24px;
    color: #E75755;
}

View design and assets in Adobe XD.

Guidelines for use

Purpose

A grant can be open or closed. This component allows the user to quickly see what the current status of the grant is.

When to use this component

Coming soon.

Layouts

Page width

Grant status indicator components are used in two-third width pages.

Full width layout

Desktop, Tablet & Mobile: One component in a row. Maximum of one component per page.
